channel.title: [317] Orion 2006 | #1 Developed 2006 Remake | 21+ Skills | 25+ Quests | Bosses |
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://img.icyboards.com/orion06rsps/apart1theme/logo.png[/img] Visit us today!:
Youtube: [url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT26ZIOhB96fMjz6y_Ewdig]Orion06Rsps - YouTube[/url]
[SIZE=5]25+ Quests | Flawless Skills | Flawless Combat | Slayer Tower | Treasure Trails | Stable ECO | Rares | ALL 2006 PvM Bosses | No Resets | Holiday Events | [/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]What is Orion 2006?[/size] [SIZE=5]We HAVE MORE CONTENT THAN ANY 2006 REMAKE[/SIZE]
We aren't like these servers that come and go by giving up on development. A lot of these 2006 remakes just fall apart due to unmotivated staff and lack of content. The thing about us is we already have more content than all of these.
[B][U][IMG]http://www.runerebels.com/images/kevin/sprites/headicons_pk%200.png[/img]Bosses[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-TzTok-Jad -Big Wolf -Chaos Elemental -Count Draynor -Dagannoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagannoth Prime -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon[/COLOR]
[HR][/HR]
[U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img]Quests[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-Cook's Assistant - Black Knights' Fortress [Completed] - Cook's Assistant [Completed] - Demon Slayer [Completed] - Doric's Quest [Completed] - Dragon Slayer [Completed] - Goblin Diplomacy [Completed] - Imp Catcher [Completed] - The Knight's Sword [Completed] - Pirate's Treasure [Completed] - Prince Ali Rescue [Completed] - The Restless Ghost [Completed] - Romeo & Juliet [Completed] - Rune Mysteries Quest [Completed] - Sheep Shearer [Completed] - Shield of Arrav [Completed] - Vampire Slayer [Completed] - Witch's Potion [Completed]
P2P: - Druidic Ritual [Completed] - Elemental Workshop [Completed] - The Fremennik Trials [Completed] - Gertrude's Cat [Completed] - Heroes Quest [Started] - Holy Grail [Completed] - Jungle Potion [Completed] - Lost City [Completed] - Merlin's Crystal [Completed] - Priest in Peril [Completed] - Scorpion Catcher [Completed] - Witch's House [Completed] -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)[/COLOR][/B]
[SIZE=1]You will not be unimpressed. [/SIZE] [SIZE=2]The Team:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045824/runescape/images/c/c6/Jagex_moderator_crown.png[/img][I][SIZE=2]Mod Mige [/i][/SIZE]
[SIZE=1][I] [U][SIZE=5]Current Features [/SIZE][/U][/I][/SIZE][I]Key: - [COLOR=#FFA500]Under development[/COLOR] - [COLOR=#008000]Finished [/COLOR] [/I][spoiler][I][COLOR=#008000] [/COLOR][/I][IMG]http://www.zybez.net/img/genimg/gettingstart/worldmap.gif[/img][B][U]World[/U][/B] [I][COLOR=#008000][B]Item dropping (global) Pathfinding Clipping (Player movement) [/B][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#008000]Searches (drawers, hay bales, cupboards)[/COLOR][/B][U][B]
Client Features[/B][/U] [B][COLOR=#008000]- Loading full 377 - Auto cache downloader - Full music system (fading music) - Enter to login - Ability to use k/m/b with money - Quick reply option for private messages - Multi platform support - Fast client[/COLOR] [/B]
[U][B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img]Prayer[/B][/U] [B][COLOR=#008000]- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate - Zombie Random[/COLOR][/B]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img]Agility[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img]Mining[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Empty and refilling rock's - All ore can be mined - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gem's - Rune essence - Granite - Sand-Stone[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img]Smithing[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct animations, working interfaces & objects[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img][/U][U]Fishing[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All fish can be caught - Big net fishing - Correct item requirements - Fishing spots located all around the world - Correct animations[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img]Cooking[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img]Woodcutting[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Stumps and re-growing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fall chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Spirit Tree[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FFA500]- Canoes (not all finished)[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img]Firemaking[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img]Fletching[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img]Crafting[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewellery Moulding[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img]Thieving[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Time[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img]Runecrafting[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Altar Entering - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img]Herblore[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All potions makeable - Identifying herbs - Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]
[HR][/HR]
[U][B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img]Combat[/B][/U] [COLOR=#008000]- PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrow upgrades) - Equipment requirements - Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img]Slayer[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Working slayer gems - Working slayer shop - Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop - Generating task's bound on combat level/slayer level - Remove task forever for slayer points - Cancel task for slayer points - All slayer masters - All slayer masters can give you the slayer location - XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://www.runerebels.com/images/kevin/sprites/headicons_pk%200.png[/img]Bosses[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-TzTok-Jad -Big Wolf -Chaos Elemental -Count Draynor -Dagannoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagannoth Prime -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon[/COLOR]
[HR][/HR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img]Quests[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-Cook's Assistant - Black Knights' Fortress [Completed] - Cook's Assistant [Completed] - Demon Slayer [Completed] - Doric's Quest [Completed] - Dragon Slayer [Completed] - Goblin Diplomacy [Completed] - Imp Catcher [Completed] - The Knight's Sword [Completed] - Pirate's Treasure [Completed] - Prince Ali Rescue [Completed] - The Restless Ghost [Completed] - Romeo & Juliet [Completed] - Rune Mysteries Quest [Completed] - Sheep Shearer [Completed] - Shield of Arrav [Completed] - Vampire Slayer [Completed] - Witch's Potion [Completed]
P2P: - Druidic Ritual [Completed] - Elemental Workshop [Completed] - The Fremennik Trials [Completed] - Gertrude's Cat [Completed] - Heroes Quest [Started] - Holy Grail [Completed] - Jungle Potion [Completed] - Lost City [Completed] - Merlin's Crystal [Completed] - Priest in Peril [Completed] - Scorpion Catcher [Completed] - Witch's House [Completed] -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img]Music & Sounds[/U] [COLOR="#008000"]-All skilling sounds -All combat sounds -Working music player and unlocking -Music playing in all regions -Music fade and volume control[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img]Mini-games[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows Brothers -Fight Pits -Pest Control [/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500]-Fishing Trawler[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img]Random Events[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie -Rock Golem -Spirit Tree -Zombie -Evil Chicken - Swarm - Shade - Whirlpool -Random Event Handling System -No randoms in tut island, in certain areas, etc...[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img]Miscellaneous[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Random event handler that works great with all random events eg; (halloween, christmas, easter) - Skill handler that works great with all skills - Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests - Around 13 random events in place as of now - 20 done to full completion [/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500](Farming is currently being done)[/COLOR][COLOR=#008000] - Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) - Pick-ables (cabbages, onions, wheat, bananas etc.) - Skill interfaces - Pets - Working objects all around the world - Almost every rs npc spawned all around the world - Changelog with 650+ changes now - Christmas Crackers - Holiday events handler - Working desert - Single and double doors - Dupe free guarantee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap). - Runescape guilds - All consumables that runescape had in 2006 - Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only - All runescapes shops that were in 2006 - All runescapes potions - Correct runescape start - Sailing - Gnome Glider - Bank Pins - Correct runescape teleports - Wilderness warning - All rings/amulets loaded - Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req - Tele tabs - Teleother - Lots of minigames - Clipping following/npcs - Empty handler added for items that can be emptied - Crystal Chest - Flour Mill - Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed - Update Cache - Members Only Benefits - Runescape prices - Chat filtering - Running/w energy - Magic Carpet - Skill Guides - Same or close to same exp rates as runescape will be voted for - Weapon Poisoning [/COLOR] [/spoiler]
[size=10pt]Do not think this is all we have to offer, there is much much more, in which will come nearer the future. [/size][img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2rcpy0k.png[/img] [spoiler] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/oitchc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/k13lt5.png[/img] [video=youtube;Js3pXIYbxio]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Js3pXIYbxio[/video] [/spoiler]
[I][B]Credits:[/B][/I] [I] 2006Scape Jagex R-S Community 06Kayos Project2006 Mod Mige Scott [/I]
[I][B][COLOR=#008000]
[/COLOR][/B][/I]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/9a1lyh.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.description:
@scottdoggz77 wrote:

[CENTER]
Visit us today!:

Youtube: Orion06Rsps - YouTube

[SIZE=5]25+ Quests | Flawless Skills | Flawless Combat | Slayer Tower | Treasure Trails | Stable ECO | Rares | ALL 2006 PvM Bosses | No Resets | Holiday Events |
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]What is Orion 2006?[/size]
[SIZE=5]We HAVE MORE CONTENT THAN ANY 2006 REMAKE[/SIZE]

We aren’t like these servers that come and go by giving up on development. A lot of these 2006 remakes just fall apart due to unmotivated staff and lack of content.
The thing about us is we already have more content than all of these.

[B][U]Bosses[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]-TzTok-Jad
-Big Wolf
-Chaos Elemental
-Count Draynor
-Dagannoth Supreme
-Dagganoth Rex
-Dagannoth Prime
-Giant Mole
-Gunthor the Brave
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon[/COLOR]

[HR][/HR]

[U]Quests[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]-Cook’s Assistant

  • Black Knights’ Fortress [Completed]
  • Cook’s Assistant [Completed]
  • Demon Slayer [Completed]
  • Doric’s Quest [Completed]
  • Dragon Slayer [Completed]
  • Goblin Diplomacy [Completed]
  • Imp Catcher [Completed]
  • The Knight’s Sword [Completed]
  • Pirate’s Treasure [Completed]
  • Prince Ali Rescue [Completed]
  • The Restless Ghost [Completed]
  • Romeo & Juliet [Completed]
  • Rune Mysteries Quest [Completed]
  • Sheep Shearer [Completed]
  • Shield of Arrav [Completed]
  • Vampire Slayer [Completed]
  • Witch’s Potion [Completed]

P2P:

  • Druidic Ritual [Completed]
  • Elemental Workshop [Completed]
  • The Fremennik Trials [Completed]
  • Gertrude’s Cat [Completed]
  • Heroes Quest [Started]
  • Holy Grail [Completed]
  • Jungle Potion [Completed]
  • Lost City [Completed]
  • Merlin’s Crystal [Completed]
  • Priest in Peril [Completed]
  • Scorpion Catcher [Completed]
  • Witch’s House [Completed]
    -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)[/COLOR][/B]

[SIZE=1]You will not be unimpressed.
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]The Team:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]Mod Mige
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=1][I]
[U][SIZE=5]Current Features
[/SIZE][/U][/I][/SIZE][I]Key:

  • [COLOR=#FFA500]Under development[/COLOR]
  • [COLOR=#008000]Finished
    [/COLOR]
    [/I][spoiler][I][COLOR=#008000]
    [/COLOR][/I][B][U]World[/U][/B]
    [I][COLOR=#008000][B]Item dropping (global)
    Pathfinding
    Clipping (Player movement)
    [/B][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#008000]Searches (drawers, hay bales, cupboards)[/COLOR][/B][U][B]

Client Features[/B][/U]
[B][COLOR=#008000]- Loading full 377

  • Auto cache downloader
  • Full music system (fading music)
  • Enter to login
  • Ability to use k/m/b with money
  • Quick reply option for private messages
  • Multi platform support
  • Fast client[/COLOR]
    [/B]

[U][B]Prayer[/B][/U]
[B][COLOR=#008000]- All bones bury-able

  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
  • Zombie Random[/COLOR][/B]

[B][U]Agility[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable

  • Force movement mask
  • Correct animations used
  • Run energy affected by weight and level[/COLOR]

[B][U]Mining[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Empty and refilling rock’s

  • All ore can be mined
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gem’s
  • Rune essence
  • Granite
  • Sand-Stone[/COLOR]

[B][U]Smithing[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All bars smithable

  • Smelting
  • Correct animations, working interfaces & objects[/COLOR]

[B][U][/U][U]Fishing[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All fish can be caught

  • Big net fishing
  • Correct item requirements
  • Fishing spots located all around the world
  • Correct animations[/COLOR]

[B][U]Cooking[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All fishes cookable

  • All meat cookable
  • Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
  • Cooking gauntlets
  • Correct anims & delays
  • Working interface with multiple amount options
  • Lumbridge cooking range bonus
  • Eating food
  • Wine[/COLOR]

[B][U]Woodcutting[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Stumps and re-growing trees

  • Correct hatchet finding
  • Correct hatchet animations
  • All trees cut-able
  • Correct fall chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe random event
  • Spirit Tree[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=#FFA500]- Canoes (not all finished)[/COLOR]

[B][U]Firemaking[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Correct anims

  • Ashes
  • All logs lightable
  • Colored fires
  • Clipped
  • Can’t light fires in Bank
  • Can click logs on the ground and light them[/COLOR]

[B][U]Fletching[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All logs can be fletched

  • Correct interfaces
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all[/COLOR]

[B][U]Crafting[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Gem cutting

  • Tanning
  • Spinning & Picking flax
  • Pottery
  • Jewellery Moulding[/COLOR]

[B][U]Thieving[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Stall Thieving

  • NPC Thieving
  • Correct anims & gfx
  • Correct Respawn Time[/COLOR]

[B][U]Runecrafting[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Altar Entering

  • Tiaras
  • All Altars
  • Abyss[/COLOR]

[B][U]Herblore[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All potions makeable

  • Identifying herbs
  • Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]

[HR][/HR]

[U][B]Combat[/B][/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- PvP fully complete

  • PvN fully complete
  • X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)
  • Perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula
  • Every weapon special attack
  • Equipment effects (i.e. barrow upgrades)
  • Equipment requirements
  • Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]

[B][U]Slayer[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Working slayer gems

  • Working slayer shop
  • Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop
  • Generating task’s bound on combat level/slayer level
  • Remove task forever for slayer points
  • Cancel task for slayer points
  • All slayer masters
  • All slayer masters can give you the slayer location
  • XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task[/COLOR]

[B][U]Bosses[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]-TzTok-Jad
-Big Wolf
-Chaos Elemental
-Count Draynor
-Dagannoth Supreme
-Dagganoth Rex
-Dagannoth Prime
-Giant Mole
-Gunthor the Brave
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon[/COLOR]

[HR][/HR]

[B][U]Quests[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]-Cook’s Assistant

  • Black Knights’ Fortress [Completed]
  • Cook’s Assistant [Completed]
  • Demon Slayer [Completed]
  • Doric’s Quest [Completed]
  • Dragon Slayer [Completed]
  • Goblin Diplomacy [Completed]
  • Imp Catcher [Completed]
  • The Knight’s Sword [Completed]

  • Witch’s Potion [Completed]

P2P:

  • Druidic Ritual [Completed]
  • Elemental Workshop [Completed]
  • The Fremennik Trials [Completed]
  • Gertrude’s Cat [Completed]
  • Heroes Quest [Started]
  • Holy Grail [Completed]
  • Jungle Potion [Completed]
  • Lost City [Completed]
  • Merlin’s Crystal [Completed]
  • Priest in Peril [Completed]
  • Scorpion Catcher [Completed]
  • Witch’s House [Completed]
    -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)[/COLOR]

[B][U]Music & Sounds[/U]
[COLOR="#008000"]-All skilling sounds
-All combat sounds
-Working music player and unlocking
-Music playing in all regions
-Music fade and volume control[/COLOR]

[B][U]Mini-games[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]-Duel Arena
-Castle Wars
-Fight Caves
-Barrows Brothers
-Fight Pits
-Pest Control
[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500]-Fishing Trawler[/COLOR]

[B][U]Random Events[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]-Broken axe random
-Bird Nests
-Sand which Lady

  • Swarm

    -Random Event Handling System
    -No randoms in tut island, in certain areas, etc…[/COLOR]

[B][U]Miscellaneous[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Random event handler that works great with all random events eg; (halloween, christmas, easter)

  • Skill handler that works great with all skills
  • Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests
  • Around 13 random events in place as of now
  • 20 done to full completion [/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500](Farming is currently being done)[/COLOR][COLOR=#008000]
  • Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources)
  • Pick-ables (cabbages, onions, wheat, bananas etc.)
  • Skill interfaces
  • Pets
  • Working objects all around the world
  • Almost every rs npc spawned all around the world
  • Changelog with 650+ changes now
  • Christmas Crackers
  • Holiday events handler
  • Working desert
  • Single and double doors
  • Dupe free guarantee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap).
  • Runescape guilds
  • All consumables that runescape had in 2006
  • Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only
  • All runescapes shops that were in 2006
  • All runescapes potions
  • Correct runescape start
  • Sailing
  • Gnome Glider
  • Bank Pins
  • Correct runescape teleports
  • Wilderness warning
  • All rings/amulets loaded
  • Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req
  • Tele tabs
  • Teleother
  • Lots of minigames
  • Clipping following/npcs
  • Empty handler added for items that can be emptied
  • Crystal Chest
  • Flour Mill
  • Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed
  • Update Cache
  • Members Only Benefits
  • Runescape prices
  • Chat filtering
  • Running/w energy
  • Magic Carpet
  • Skill Guides
  • Same or close to same exp rates as runescape will be voted for
  • Weapon Poisoning
    [/COLOR]

[size=10pt]Do not think this is all we have to offer, there is much much more, in which will come nearer the future.
